entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Snow level 800 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Snow level rising to 800 metres in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Snow level 800 metres. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 24 March 2023
